PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness umbilical cord blood placental blood transplantation treat patient hematologic cancer aplastic anemia .
DOC.brief_title: Umbilical Cord Blood Placental Blood Transplantation Treating Patients With Hematologic Cancer Aplastic Anemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response rate patient chronic myeloid leukemia , acute leukemia , lymphoma , myeloma , myelodysplasia , aplastic anemia , Fanconi 's anemia , histiocytosis , hereditary immunodeficiency , storage disorder treat allogeneic umbilical cord placental blood transplantation . - Determine toxicity regimen patient . - Determine survival patient treat regimen . - Determine incidence graft-versus-host disease patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : Patients receive standard preparative regimen disease . Following preparative regimen patient undergo umbilical cord blood stem cell transplantation day 0 . Patients follow every 1-2 week 6 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 30 patient accrue study within 4-5 year .
